title: 194: How Do We Deal With A Medical Crisis? | Ear Biscuits Ep. 194
description:
Restless nights in the hospital, pints upon pints of blood, and a wake-up call on the importance of love, family, and nurses. Link recounts his mom's husband's (not step-dad's) near brush with death when he visited LA recently in this episode of Ear Biscuits. Warning: There will be mention of blood and certain medical procedures that may trigger the queasy.
